item.title: Andrew Tate Is Holding Me Hostage In His Basement
item.description: No, that was clickbait. Still, that can be used as evidence against… Anyways… I’ve been in The Real World for almost a month. Exactly MINUS $49.99 is in my pocket. Not a big achievement. “Why am I doing it?” you ask. My copywriting has gotten way better. Thus, my Twitter outreach is expanding. I’m getting answers! It’s usually rejections or compliments. “Brother, please change your approach. No one will read that long message.
item.content:encoded:
No, that was clickbait.

Still, that can be used as evidence against…

Anyways…

I’ve been in The Real World for almost a month.

Exactly MINUS $49.99 is in my pocket.

Not a big achievement.

“Why am I doing it?” you ask.

My copywriting has gotten way better.

Thus, my Twitter outreach is expanding.

I’m getting answers!

It’s usually rejections or compliments.

“Brother, please change your approach. No one will read that long message.”

But a lot better than what I had before.

IGNORANCE.

And you know what else I was not paying attention to?

Business principles.

You can blast them into your life.

It’s also very good to learn the productivity hacks in there.

Believe it or not, I was too lazy to write a to-do list until now.

Again, nothing on these campuses is new information.

But it’s presented in an awesome way.

I’ll be here next month again.

My plan is to make this at least self-sustaining.

Let’s see what I do next time.
